charinfo.name: Hoshigaki Kisame (S)
charinfo.description: Hoshigake Kisame (S) is the partner of Uchiha Itachi in Akatsuki. He is an expert swordsman and missing nin from the Hidden Mist Village.

abilities.name: Samehada Fusion
abilities.description: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) uses Samehada Fusion. The following 2 turns he will gain 30 destructible defense. Kisame (S) will gain 2 additional random chakra if he has a chakra removal skill used on him during this skill.

abilities.name: Samehada Frenzy
abilities.description: Using Samehada Frenzy Hoshigaki Kisame (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. Chakra removal skills that enemy uses will remove 1 less chakra for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Shark Bomb
abilities.description: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) uses Shark Bomb on 1 enemy dealing 30 piercing damage. That enemy will lose 1 taijutsu or 1 bloodline chakra.

abilities.name: Water Isolation
abilities.description: This skill makes Hoshigaki Kisame (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
